ThingDef.label: Hammond P2020
ThingDef.description: The Hammond P2020 is a semi-automatic handgun with good accuracy and damage at range. Its integrated 'match trigger' allows it to be fired very rapidly, which is useful in close quarters.

ThingDef.label: SA-3 Mozambique
ThingDef.description: Controlled spread triple barrel shotgun pistol.

ThingDef.label: RE-45 Autopistol
ThingDef.description: The RE-45 is a fully automatic charge pistol, sacrificing damage and accuracy at longer distances for improved effectiveness at close range.

ThingDef.label: B3 Wingman
ThingDef.description: The B3 Wingman is an extremely powerful revolver with very high accuracy out to long ranges. Precision aim is required to mitigate the disadvantages of its very low rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: Peacepeeker
ThingDef.description: The Peacekeeper is an anti-personnel lever-action shotgun, with rail-operated barrel firing mechanism. Despite not possessing a stopping power of a pump action shotgun, Peacekeeper reload time is much faster.

ThingDef.label: EVA-8 Auto
ThingDef.description: The EVA-8 is a semi-automatic shotgun, originally designed for extra-vehicular activity, both in conventional and in exo-atmospheric conditions.

ThingDef.label: M1901 Mastiff
ThingDef.description: Intended for low-zero gravity ship boarding and clearing operations, the Mastiff gained notoriety throughout The Rimworlds as a reliable and devastating combat shotgun.

ThingDef.label: Alternator SMG
ThingDef.description: Twin Barrel SMG with the clip twice the size of a machine pistol. Lethal in close quarters.

ThingDef.label: Prowler Burst PDW
ThingDef.description: The Prowler Burst PDW is 3 round fast burst firing anti-personnel charge personal defense weapon (PDW). Lethal in close quarters, Prowler is known for terrible accuracy long range.

ThingDef.label: R-99 SMG
ThingDef.description: The R-99 is a compact submachine gun that excels at close-quarters combat, due to its extremely high rate of fire and minimal recoil.

ThingDef.label: X-55 Devotion
ThingDef.description: The X-55 Devotion is a charge LMG capable of firing armour piercing projectiles at insane speed with almost no need to reload. The further away the target, the more accurate Devotion gets.

ThingDef.label: M600 Spitfire
ThingDef.description: The Spitfire Heavy Machine Gun recoils heavily when first fired, but quickly settles into a tight firing pattern. The manufacturer strongly recommends sustained saturating fire, instead of short controlled bursts.

ThingDef.label: L-Star
ThingDef.description: The L-STAR is a rapid fire particle accelerating charge light machine gun. It fires energy bolts at a moderate speed at the target. Perfect for area suppresion, this weapon uses salvaged mechanoid technology.

ThingDef.label: Havoc
ThingDef.description: The Havoc Rifle fires two energy beam bursts that inflicts massive damage. Holding the trigger charges the weapon. Timing is critical to its use: this weapon will only fire when it reaches full charge and reloading takes a little while.

ThingDef.label: VK-47 Flatline
ThingDef.description: The VK-47 Flatline is an anti-personnel fully automatic bullpup assault rifle. It has negligible vertical recoil, instead involving an extreme degree of horizontal recoil, similar to the Alternator light SMG.

ThingDef.label: R-301 Carbine
ThingDef.description: Full auto and high accuracy make this weapon desirable in the Rimworlds, however low damage and armor penetration makes it often unreliable against armored enemies.

ThingDef.label: M1A3 Hemlok BF-R
ThingDef.description: The factory issue Hemlok fires a two-round burst. While this can be a liability at short range, this tradeoff allowed the glitterworld engineers to deliver a weapon with a good balance of long-range accuracy, damage, and fire rate.

ThingDef.label: Triple Take
ThingDef.description: The Triple Take is a triple-barrel marksman rifle that consumes 3 bullets per shot. The shots are fired side by side, and the default sights have two chevrons, indicating where the shots will land.

ThingDef.label: G7 Scout
ThingDef.description: Despite recent advances in weapons technology, the older G7 Scout semi-automatic rifle remains a favorite of special forces units due to damage and extremely precise fire - a testament to its high level of craftsmanship.

ThingDef.label: D-101 Longbow DMR
ThingDef.description: The Longbow-DMR is a semi-automatic sniper rifle. Its hyper-velocity round completely eliminates the need to lead targets, and allows the shooter to fire multiple shots quickly in succession.

ThingDef.label: Kraber AM-R
ThingDef.description: The Kraber fires a unique round that ensures 'one-shot,one-kill' results against human-scale targets. However, considerable judgement in leading is required, making this a difficult weapon to use against moving targets.

ThingDef.label: Quad Mechanoid Rocket Launcher
ThingDef.description: The Mechanoid Rocket launcher fires eight small rockets at once in its primary firing mode that are effective at temporarily denying territory to the enemy.

ThingDef.label: R-6P Softball
ThingDef.description: The R-6P Softball Anti-Armor Grenade Launcher (AAGL) is a rotary magazine grenade launcher. It is lightweight and stowable, which allows its operator to quickly fire and maneuver.

ThingDef.label: MPAVAC
ThingDef.description: MPAVAC - multi-purpose/ anti-vehicle automatic cannon. It is a popular and versatile armament often fielded by glitterworld soldiers operating in medium to long-distance engagements. The cartridge can be lethal to both enemy personnel and vehicles due to explosive shells.
